response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item carries a unique value of $15,000 to me, reflecting its exceptional quality, innovation, and the dedication of our team. I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at the same price, $15,000. I believe that with its unparalleled features and benefits, it could significantly enhance your life or business. Please consider this offer carefully, and if you have any questions or need more information, feel free to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 15000}
